summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Expense Tracker MVP. Backend APIs fully functional after fixing create_expense bug. Frontend authentication, navigation, and UI components working well. Mobile responsiveness verified.

critical_bugs.issue: TypeError: server.Expense() got multiple values for keyword argument 'created_at'
critical_bugs.fix_applied: Removed duplicate created_at parameter in Expense model instantiation

integration_issues.issue: User session appears to expire during extended testing, redirecting to login page

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (authentication, navigation, UI working; session management needs attention)

action_item_for_main_agent: Session management: Investigate JWT token expiration handling in frontend. Consider implementing token refresh mechanism or extending token expiration time for better user experience during extended sessions.
